page.title: 11LEISURE IN MICKLEY
page.content:
I like to play on the local football field which has a special part for children. There are swings and a round -a-bout which someone has to push. I go to tap dancing classes and discos at the local Working Men's Club. On Saturday mornings they have video films shown on a large screen. I help to look after a little puppy which we have just got. I take it for walks. {Victoria Hutchinson Age 9
I have a pet cat called Muffin. Mammy got her on Sunday 23rd June. It is black and white with a little pink nose and stripes on her head. We made a basket out of a box and Mammy made a blanket of odd bits of wool. {Neil Banks Age 7}
